name: Apollo Red
description:
The great sage and seer Ogun has peaked into the future and in his great disappearance, a final message to the so-called Eternals of the cosmos; "For the end of days is finally upon us, the end of all things that there ever was, and all things that will ever be, for a great void spreads across the cosmos, in its wake, a trail of death and destruction. What faith lies for us beings who have never known death? Where do we  Eternals go when we die ? " 

Young acolyte, a final task for you. Journey to the center of the cosmos, deliver a final message, pass on our legacy.

Controls::

Only Mouse and Keyboard Supported at the moment.

  • WASD | Movement
  • Left Mouse Button | Shoot
  • Right Mouse Button | Dodge Roll
  • Q | Block
  • Z | Melee Attack
  • X | Interact
  • C | Fire Secondary
  • Numpad 1 | Melee Skill 1
  • Numpad 2 | Gun Skill 1
  • Numpad 3 | Melee Skill 2
  • Numpad 4 | Gun Skill 2

Apollo Red is one of the many video game prototype projects catching dust on my computer. It's an unfinished buggy mess, practically unplayable and there I say it, barely stable.  It was intended to be a small project to learn 3D game development in Unity. I can't really call it a complete 'video game', if anything, it's more like an early game concept. It's just a collection of ideas splattered all over Unity in no coherent order, with me trying to make sense of it all.  Give it a try, be gentle and tell me what you think, all constructive feedback is welcome.
